tweets.text: My I.Q. is one of the highest - and you all know it!
Many people have said I’m the world’s greatest writer of 140 character sentences.
I am least racist person there is
Many are saying I'm the best 140 character writer in the world
created by and for the Chinese
I am going to save Social Security without any cuts. I know where to get the money from. Nobody else does.
We're going to rebuild the economy like never before and Mexico is going to pay for it! #MAGA

Was going to watch the NBA return but then they started NEELING for our great anthem so I had to turn it back to FOX news. They even have the hateful Black Lives Matter on the floor! We need to stop letting these crooks attack our great country. NO NEELING FOR THE ANTHEM!

The Radical Left is pushing the Russia hoax again. It's always Russia Russia Russia. My talks with Putin were tremendous, and he said very nice things about how he was helping us fight the Taliban, so we're going to give them weapons to help us out.
...And Putin has never told a lie to me before! We need to stop these horrible globalists before  Communist Joe Biden helps their agenda!
It really is tough seeing one of your strongest supporters died from something that a lot of people are saying no one could have seen coming. I’m hearing that a lot.
The medical and scientific establishments don’t want you to know about demons in your semen and I want to know why!!
My taxes are under a standard 50-year audit.
Why are people upset w/ me over Pres Obama’s birth certificate? I got him to release it, or whatever it was, when nobody else could!
